title: Thursday Post Show (02-03-22)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (02-03-22)
description:
Bobby and Amy start talking about what’s on the BobbyCast and 4 Things with Amy Brown this week. Bobby reads a story about melatonin and how some people think it’s making them sick. Raymundo reveals how he wanted to be cut out of wedding photos because he was much shorter than the entire bridal and groom party. He also reveals how his wife is letting him gamble again.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
